column2: A Black Crusade is ongoing, we could earn glory by participating. §YNote: Due to hardcoded restrictions you will get no land if you are not the same religion as the crusade caller, instead you will get artefacts and favor with chaos.§!

If you are strong enough, you may force the hordes of Chaos to a target of your choosing. You must however declare the Black Crusade within 3 years. §YThis will give you a single use of the crusade CB§!
If you are strong enough, you may claim the mantle of the Everchosen.
A Black Crusade is ongoing, we could earn glory by helping.
A great champion of chaos who has shaped his own kingdom out of the lands of the weak southerners.
A great champion of chaos who has shaped her own kingdom out of the lands of the weak southerners.
There is no Chaos ruler planning a Black Crusade
There is no Everchosen or other Religious Head
Has been enough time since the last Black Crusade
Black Crusades can be called at Low Doom once per century
Core parts of Norsca or the Chaos Wastes are occupied
Only Prestigious Chaos Undivided Rulers and the Everchosen can call Black Crusades. Followers of Chaos can then join as allies when the war starts. Only one Black Crusade can be active at a time.
Prestigious Chaos Rulers and the Everchosen can call Black Crusades. Followers of Chaos can then join as allies when the war starts. Only one Black Crusade can be active at a time.
The Path of the Everchosen is handled through a pilgrimage and story events.\n This is faster and much easier than the extended version.
The Path of the Everchosen requires direct action and travelling.\n This is slower and much harder than the default version.
The Winds of Chaos are strong enough for the Black Crusade to be called.
It's §Y$CLAIMANT$§!'s duty to Carry on the word of Ormazd and Rule the infidels for greater good.
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can topple a complacent Queen to restore a strong rule to the Amazonian realm.
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can force an abdication of a decadent relative to restore her family honor.
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can follow the lead of Kurnous and join in a Wild Hunt, rampaging across the lands of the inferior species to gain trophies and defend the borders of Athel Loren.
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! cannot allow blasphemers to taint the purity of Athel Loren.
§Y$CLAIMANT$§!'s ancestors claim ownership of many of the now abandoned forest provinces. It might be the right time to retake one of them.
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can declare war to close the borders of Ulthuan
$ORDER$$SECOND_ADJ$ Civil War to change isolationist policy

§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can declare war to colonize new lands outside of Ulthuan, ridding them of corrupt or otherwise barbaric influences. Colonies increase Elven influence over the world, but can be expensive to maintain.
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can declare war to expand the Asur's influence in foreign lands, ridding them of corrupt or otherwise barbaric influences.
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can wage war to take any land for his war-herd.
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! Can migrate along with their herds to a new land to spoil in the name of the Ruinous Powers. Be warned you will lose any land you currently own.
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! Can migrate along with their herds to a new land to spoil in the name of the Ruinous Powers. Be warned you will lose any land you currently own.
Beastmen need no excuse to invade new lands. §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can attack any bordering province and occupy any land around it, as far as the herds can manage.
Beastmen need no excuse to invade new lands. §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can attack any bordering province and occupy any land around it, as far as the herds can manage.
Beastmen are vile beasts lurking beneath the cover of caves and forests and will need extra care to get rid of. §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can attack any bordering province and occupy it.
Cleanse the Fimir filth from these lands so that you may one day settle them with your own people.
Cleanse the Greenskin filth from hiding within these lands.
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! needs no reason to subjugate any realm to their whims.
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can call a raid against the unbelievers and heretics, slaughtering them and pillaging their lands for the glory of the Dark Gods!

§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can declare war to retake Ulthuan, the ancestral homeland of all Elves. You will prepare a large invasion for two years, during which troops and commanders will be gathered from all corners of your provinces. If you fail to wage war within these two years, you'll be shamed.
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can declare war to subjugate any Druchii ruler who opposes us.

Dwarf rulers can declare reconquest wars to reclaim counties that are not held by dwarfs or Norse dwarfs, and are either inside de-jure Karak Ankor and Drak Ankor or mountains held by Greenskins or Skaven.

As a Dwarf, §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can declare a Grudge War against either any character whom they have a pending Grudge with, any liege whose vassals they have a pending Grudge with or any Greenskin, Skaven or Chaos Dwarf ruler. §Y$CLAIMANT$§! will be able to demand compensation if they hold a Grudge against the target. If the target is a Greenskin, Skaven or Chaos Dwarf, §Y$CLAIMANT$§! will instead get a Honour bonus, the target will be executed and you won't be able do declare a Grudge War against their heir for 5 years.
§Y$TARGET$§! is a cursed Unbaraki, an Oathbreaker! Dwarf Law and Lore stipulate this as a clear cause for war!
column3: L'excommunication de §Y$TARGET$§! a été décidée, un motif de guerre légitime s'il en est !
column4: §Y$TARGET$§! wurde exkommuniziert - einen besseren Kriegsgrund hat es noch nie gegeben!
column6: ¡§Y$TARGET$§! ha sido excomulgado, una causa justa para la guerra si alguna vez hubo una!

column2: A Chaos Dwarf ruler can attack any neighbouring duchy with the objective of subjugating its populace and taking them into slavery. On the first siege won inside the enemy's demesne, you will get a choice to use the slaves to fill either your capital's factories or its slave levy. You also have a chance to imprison characters that are residing in that province. At the successive sieges, you will only get the chance to imprison characters.

Launches the WAAAGH! on the target kingdom. If the war is won, §Y$CLAIMANT$§! will get all the titles inside of it, the provinces conquered will be instantly converted to his culture and religion and their holdings will be converted to tribal ones.
Greenskins can attack any neighbouring county even if it is held by fellow Greenskins. §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can also attack any bordering province and occupy them, as far as the boyz can manage.

Greenskins can attack any neighbouring duchy even if it is held by fellow Greenskins, but only if they have the Medium Greenskin Power law or higher. To reflect their warlike ways, the truce cooldown period is only one year.
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can wage war to take any land for his horde.
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can attempt to conquer the impervious and deadly deserts of Nehekhara,despite what common sense would tell.
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can found and lead an expedition to the old ruins of Nehekhara,to recover some of the ancient artifacts hidden in those desert tombs.
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! remembers far back,when their realm stretched far wider. It is time to restore the ancient glory of Nehekhara,under its rightful ruler.

§Y$CLAIMANT$§! used to rule over all of Nehekhara,long ago. But now,they're only one of the many Kings to claim ownership of the ancient Empire. Both their ancestors and their descendants have come back to life to bring forth the same claims.
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! has not forgotten this blasphemer's desecration. It might be time to take back what was unrightfully stolen.
Â§Y$CLAIMANT$Â§! remembers far back,when their realm stretched far wider. It is time to restore the ancient glory of Nehekhara,under its rightful ruler.
?Y$CLAIMANT$?! is the greatest Skaven ever! Foolish interlopers think they can steal the celebrated spot from him? Ah! He'll teach-kill them, for good! Then they'll be his servants, yes-yes!
Skaven can freely conquer and vassalize counties held by other Skaven with little to no truce and no repercussions.
Pitiful surfacers, manthings, dwarfthings, greenthings, elfthings... they will all become food and slaves for their Skaven masters one day!
The dark underground tunnels plagued by the ratmen are a narrow and dangerous place, almost inaccessible for any other creature.
Purge the Skaven surface dwellers in [Title.GetBaseName]
Time to reclaim Imperial Land that rightfully belongs to you. Beware your subordinates will not accept when the target is defeding against heretics.
